title: Makes a scheme to defraud a person in obtaining a credit loan secured by an interest in real property a felony
summary: Makes a scheme to defraud a person in obtaining a credit loan secured by an interest in real property a felony; applies to reverse redlining situations; provides for various felony grades depending on the amount of money involved.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to a scheme to defraud in obtaining a credit loan secured by an interest in real property
